content: You can then use these Crafting Materials to upgrade the Drink at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove within Black Wind Mountain. Each upgrade will provide a sizeable buff to your healing potential. As you level the Drink up, more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed to further upgrade it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sunset_of_the_Nine_Skies.md', within the main section titled 'Sunset of the Nine Skies'.
The content is as follows:
You can then use these Crafting Materials to upgrade the Drink at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove within Black Wind Mountain. Each upgrade will provide a sizeable buff to your healing potential. As you level the Drink up, more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed to further upgrade it.
